title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, back, and chain stitches with withdrawn element work on plain weave foundation
description: Horizontal rectangle divided into three columns of geometric pattern bands, in white withdrawn element work or embroidered in red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, back, and chain stitches with withdrawn element work on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-410.
